mapper.select: select anum, title, description, aname, hit, date, price from article order by date desc
select anum, title, description, aname, date, price from article where anum=#{anum}
mapper.insert: insert into article(title, description, aname, hit, date, price) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{aname}, 0, #{date})
mapper.update: update article set hit=hit+1 where anum=#{anum}
